item.title: 苹果芯片高管否认离职传闻
item.guid: 苹果芯片高管否认离职传闻
item.description:
Recent reports indicate that Johny Srouji, Apple's Senior Vice President of Hardware Technologies, recently told Tim Cook that he is "seriously considering" leaving the company in the near future. 近日有消息称，负责硬件技术的苹果高级副总裁 Johny Srouji 最近告诉库克，他正在「认真考虑」在不久的将来离职。

Regarding the aforementioned news, Srouji stated that he currently intends to remain at Apple. His internal departmental memo mentioned that everyone is very concerned about the speculation and rumors surrounding his future at Apple, and also needs to hear his "voice" directly. 对于上述消息，Srouji 表示自己目前依然会留在苹果。其在部门内部的备忘录提到，大家都很关注他在苹果的未来发展猜测和谣言，同时也需要直接听到他自己的「声音」。

Srouji emphasized, "I love my team, and I also love working at Apple. I have no plans to leave Apple in the short term." Srouji 强调， 他爱自己的团队，并且也热爱在苹果工作，「我短期内没有计划离开苹果」。

It is reported that Srouji is one of Apple's most respected executives and the architect behind Apple's in-house chip strategy. 据悉，Srouji 是苹果最受尊敬的高管之一，也是苹果自研芯片战略的操盘手。

As a key figure in Apple's in-house chip strategy, Srouji is one of the biggest contributors to the M-series and A-series chips, giving Apple a huge advantage over competitors in terms of performance and energy efficiency. 作为苹果自研芯片战略的核心人物，Srouji 是 M 系列和 A 系列芯片的最大功臣之一，让苹果在性能和能效方面获得了对竞争对手的巨大优势。

According to a Bloomberg report last week, Cook and the entire Apple executive team are desperately trying to retain Srouji, including offering more generous compensation packages and promising him more authority in the future. 据彭博社上周报道，库克以及整个苹果高管层都在疯狂挽留 Srouji，包括提供更加丰厚的薪酬待遇，以及许诺在未来给他更多职权。

The proposal put forward by some senior executives within the company is to promote Srouji to Chief Technology Officer, responsible for most of the hardware engineering and chip technology work – which would make him Apple's second most powerful executive. This is also a very "untraditional" approach: Apple has never officially established a CTO position in its history. 公司内部一些高管提出的方案是，将 Srouji 提升为首席技术官，负责硬件工程和芯片技术的大部分工作——这将使他成为苹果第二有权势的高管。 而这也是非常「反传统」的做法：苹果历史上从未设立过正式的 CTO 职位。

item.title: 11 月被投诉钓鱼网站 TOP10 公布，腾讯、苹果中招
item.guid: 11-月被投诉钓鱼网站-TOP10-公布，腾讯、苹果中招
item.description:
Recently, according to data from the 12321 Cyber Malicious and Spam Information Reporting and Acceptance Center of the Internet Society of China, based on SMS, email, website, and other information reported by netizens to 12321, the top ten phishing websites complained about in November 2025 are as follows: 日前，中国互联网协会原因 12321 网络不良与垃圾信息举报受理中心数据，据 12321 接到网民投诉的短信、邮件、网站等信息，2025 年 11 月被投诉的钓鱼网站前十名如下：

    The most complained about phishing scam website impersonated Tencent, with 89 complaints, a decrease of 9.2% compared to October.

    The second most complained about phishing scam website impersonated the National Human Resources and Social Security Department, a decrease of 17.2% compared to October.

    Apple ranked third, with 25 complaints.

    At the same time, major banks (such as China Merchants Bank, China Construction Bank, Bank of China, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, Agricultural Bank of China) being impersonated was also a hard-hit area; airlines, public security, procuratorate, and court websites also made it onto the top 10 list in November.

Upon verification, it has been confirmed that criminals creating realistic fake websites to carry out phishing scams against a large number of users is a common trick. If users visit these phishing websites and fill in real information as prompted, it will lead to the theft of personal or bank card information, or they will be tricked into transferring money under pretexts such as income tax, deposits, or handling fees, thereby suffering financial losses. 经核实，不法分子炮制逼真的山寨网站对广大用户实施钓鱼诈骗，是一种常见诈骗伎俩。用户如果访问这些钓鱼网站，并按照网站提示填写真实信息，将导致个人信息或银行卡信息被盗，或被对方以所得税、保证金、手续费等借口让你转账汇款来骗取钱财，进而蒙受经济损失。

The 12321 Acceptance Center reminds users that if they receive related scam phishing text messages, they should not open links in the messages, disclose personal information, and certainly not be intimidated by scammers' "court summons" text message threats. 12321 受理中心提醒，如果收到相关的诈骗钓鱼短信，不要打开短信中的链接、泄露自己的个人信息，更不要被骗子「法院起诉」短信威胁所吓倒。

At the same time, 12321 reiterates to users who have lost their Apple phones that the Apple Security Center will not proactively send lost and found text messages, emails, or make phone calls. Do not fall for scams; it is recommended to consult the "official website" or file a complaint with the 12321 Acceptance Center. 同时 12321 再次提醒曾经丢失过苹果手机的用户，Apple 安全中心不会主动发送遗失找回短信、邮件和打电话，切勿上当受骗；建议向「官方网站」咨询或向 12321 受理中心投诉。

item.title: DeepSeek 创始人入选《自然》年度十大科学人物
item.guid: DeepSeek-创始人入选《自然》年度十大科学人物
item.description:
Early this morning, Nature magazine announced its "Nature's 10" list for 2025. 今天凌晨，《自然》杂志公布了 2025 年度十大人物榜单（Nature’s 10）。

It is reported that the list is selected by the editorial team of Nature magazine, aiming to highlight the most influential research and important developments shaping the world. Regarding the honorees: 据悉，该榜单由《自然》杂志编辑团队评选，旨在突出最具影响力的研究以及正在塑造世界的重要发展。入选者方面：

    DeepSeek founder Liang Wenfeng was selected, and Nature's commentary on him was: "After making a name for himself in the investment field, a Chinese financial prodigy founded DeepSeek."

    Also on the list is Du Mengran, a Chinese scientist and deep-sea explorer, whom the magazine described as "the scientist who unveiled the deepest animal ecosystem on Earth." The list highlights her discovery of the deepest animal ecosystem on Earth, more than 9,000 meters below sea level, where she "witnessed unprecedented sights for the scientific community" at the bottom of the ocean.

    American microbiologist and immunologist Susan Monarez, telescope pioneer Tony Tyson who built the new Vera C. Rubin Observatory, mosquito breeder Luciano Moreira who bred billions of mosquitoes to fight disease in Brazil, and six-month-old baby KJ Muldoon who received the world's first highly personalized CRISPR gene-editing therapy, among others, were also included in the list.

Meanwhile, Nature also announced its "People to Watch in 2026," including medical oncologist Georgina Long, Sony AI's Global Head of AI Governance Alice Xiang, and others. 同时，《自然》还公布了值得关注的 2026 年人物，包含医学肿瘤学家 Georgina Long、索尼 AI 的全球人工智能治理负责人 Alice Xiang 等。

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro 系列官方降价 300 元
item.guid: iPhone-17-Pro-系列官方降价-300-元
item.description:
Yesterday, the Apple Store Tmall official flagship store channel announced a limited-time price adjustment for the iPhone 17 Pro series: 昨日，Apple Store 天猫官方旗舰店渠道宣布，限时调整 iPhone 17 Pro 系列价格：

Both iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max are subject to a limited-time direct price reduction of 300 yuan.

Specifically, the iPhone 17 Pro, originally priced from 8999 yuan, is now available from 8699 yuan, while the iPhone 17 Pro Max, originally priced from 9999 yuan, has dropped to 9699 yuan. 具体来看，原价 8999 元起的 iPhone 17 Pro 现到手价 8699 元起，而原价 9999 元起的 iPhone 17 Pro Max 到手价降为 9699 元起。

And yesterday, topics related to "iPhone 17 Pro series breaking below issue price" also trended on hot searches. Many netizens commented, "The price drop isn't enough," and "Am I really short of that 300 yuan?" 而在昨日，「iPhone 17 Pro 系列破发」相关话题也登上热搜。其中也有不少网友表示「没降到位」「我是差那 300 元吗？」。

According to previous news from blogger "Digital Chat Station," the iPhone 17 series has currently completed 10 million activations in the Chinese market. 据博主「数码闲聊站」此前消息，iPhone 17 系列目前已完成中国市场 1000 万的激活量。

The agency 'Counterpoint' also pointed out that the iPhone 17 series was widely popular in both China and the US, attracting many users to upgrade, thus achieving double-digit annual sales growth in both markets. 而机构「Counterpoint」也曾指出，iPhone 17 系列在中美两地都广受欢迎，吸引了不少用户升级，因此两地市场的年销售额都实现了两位数增长。

The agency also pointed out that Apple's position as a top smartphone vendor will be maintained until 2029; furthermore, the foldable iPhone to be released next year and the newly designed iPhone in 2027 will continue to expand its advantage. 机构还指出，苹果的顶级智能手机销售商地位将会保持到 2029 年；接下来，将于明年发布的折叠屏 iPhone 以及 2027 年全新设计的 iPhone 都还会继续扩大优势。

item.title: 罗永浩：手里有钱不排除重新启动做手机
item.guid: 罗永浩：手里有钱不排除重新启动做手机
item.description:
Recently, Luo Yonghao shared his various views on industries such as mobile phones, podcasts, and AI at Geek Park's IF 2026 event. 日前，罗永浩在极客公园的 IF 2026 活动上，分享了自己对于手机、播客、AI 等行业的各种看法。

Facing an AI wave even grander than the Industrial Revolution, Luo Yonghao stated bluntly, 'If we can't make it work this time, there will be no excuses.' In the next ten years, mobile phones will still not be replaced, and Luo Yonghao is still not ready to exit the stage. 面对比工业革命还宏大的 AI 浪潮，罗永浩直言，「这轮要是做不出来，就没借口了」。未来十年，手机依然不会被取代，而罗永浩也依然没准备退场。

Luo Yonghao stated that if a startup now creates something good that aligns with the interests of giants, most will be 'copied to death' rather than acquired. He revealed that despite Smartisan Technology going bankrupt 7 years ago, it still had over a million daily active users (last year). 罗永浩表示，现在如果创业公司做出好的东西，跟巨头感兴趣的方向一致，大部分是被「抄死」，而不是被收购。其透露，尽管锤子科技倒闭 7 年，但（去年）依然有百万以上的日活用户数。

Regarding whether he would re-enter the mobile phone industry, Luo Yonghao said, 'People have always wanted to invest, but I don't dare to make phones again, for fear of losing other people's money.' At the same time, he also stated, 'If we make a bunch of things and achieve great success, and have a lot of our own money, we don't rule out restarting mobile phone manufacturing.' 对于是否还会入局手机行业，罗永浩则表示「一直有人要投资，我也不敢再做手机了，怕把别人的钱赔光了。」同时他也称「如果我们做了一堆东西，取得了很大成功，手里有大把自己的钱，也不排除重新启动做手机。」

Subsequently, Luo Yonghao stated that he and his team are thinking about whether they can 'kidnap' one of the 'giants' into the process. 'If it succeeds, I don't really care if I'm the boss; I just hope this product is done correctly in the right direction.' 随后，罗永浩表示自己与团队在想，能不能在做这个的过程中，把「巨头」里的某一个给绑架进来。「如果成了，我是不是老板其实没那么介意，我只希望这个产品在一个正确的方向做对了。」

At the same time, facing the current situation of 'no longer innovating,' Luo Yonghao expressed hope that any company could quickly develop an AI phone to benefit humanity. He even lamented, 'Even if it means burning my own money, I'd be willing to prototype the world's best AI phone, then let them copy me, and I go bankrupt, I'd still be willing.' 同时，面对目前「不再创新」的局面，罗永浩表示希望任何一家能把 AI 手机尽快做出来造福人类。其更是感叹「甚至如果是烧我自己的钱，我都愿意打版一个全世界最好的 AI 手机，然后让他们抄我，我倒闭，我都愿意。」

item.title: 马斯克最新设想：每年发射百万吨级卫星来扩张 AI 算力
item.guid: 马斯克最新设想：每年发射百万吨级卫星来扩张-AI-算力
item.description:
Recently, Elon Musk proposed an idea on X, planning to expand global AI computing power by launching millions of tons of satellites annually. 近日，马斯克在 X 上提出设想，计划通过每年发射百万吨级卫星来扩张全球 AI 算力。

He stated that within the next 3 years, satellites with localized AI computing capabilities, only needing to transmit results from low-latency, sun-synchronous orbits, will become the lowest-cost way to generate AI bitstreams; within 4 years, this will also be the fastest path to expansion. 他表示，未来 3 年内，具备本地化 AI 计算能力的卫星，只需从低延迟、太阳同步轨道传回结果，将成为生成 AI 比特流的最低成本方式；在 4 年内，这也将是扩展速度最快的路径。

Musk pointed out that easily accessible power resources on Earth are becoming strained, and by deploying satellites in orbit, each equipped with 100kW of power, an additional 100GW of AI computing power can be added annually, without operational or maintenance costs. These satellites will connect with the Starlink constellation via high-bandwidth lasers, forming a large-scale computing network. 马斯克指出，地球上易获取的电力资源已趋紧张，而通过在轨部署卫星，每颗配备 100kW 功率，可实现每年新增 100GW 的 AI 算力，且无需运营或维护成本。这些卫星将通过高带宽激光与 Starlink 星座连接，形成大规模计算网络。

Furthermore, he proposed establishing satellite factories on the Moon, using mass drivers (electromagnetic railguns) to accelerate AI satellites to lunar escape velocity, eliminating the need for rocket launches. This plan is expected to expand AI computing power to over 100TW annually and propel humanity towards a Kardashev Type II civilization. 更进一步，他提出在月球建立卫星工厂，利用质量驱动器（电磁轨道炮）将 AI 卫星加速至月球逃逸速度，无需火箭发射。该方案有望扩展至每年超过 100TW 的 AI 算力，并推动人类迈向卡尔达肖夫二级文明。

Musk added that once the lunar factories, robots, and drivers form a closed-loop system, the system might detach from traditional currency and operate autonomously using 'watts' and 'tons' as units. 马斯克补充称，一旦月球工厂、机器人和驱动器形成闭环系统，该体系可能会脱离传统货币，以「瓦特」和「吨」为单位自主运行。

Meanwhile, Musk also emphasized in another post that the cost per trillion operations for chips will plummet by several orders of magnitude in the coming years, meaning AI training costs will significantly decrease, and AI computing power will become popularized. 与此同时，马斯克还在另一则帖子中强调，芯片每万亿次操作的成本将在未来几年内骤降数个数量级，这意味着 AI 训练成本将显著降低，AI 算力也将走向普及化。

Previously, he also predicted that thanks to solar energy and radiative cooling, the cost of operating large-scale AI systems in space will be lower than comparable systems on Earth within the next 4-5 years. 此前，他还预测，得益于太阳能与辐射冷却，未来 4~5 年内在太空运行大规模 AI 系统的成本将低于地球同类系统。

item.title: 影石创始人：影翎无人机可对标友商主流机型
item.guid: 影石创始人：影翎无人机可对标友商主流机型
item.description:
According to IT Home, last night, Liu Jingkang, founder of Insta360, released an internal letter. 据 IT 之家消息，昨晚，影石创始人刘靖康发布内部信。

Regarding the recent news of the lukewarm reception for the new Yingling drone product, Liu Jingkang responded in the internal letter: 'Yingling sold over 30 million yuan in China alone within 48 hours, and multiple overseas markets are currently undergoing certification processes and will soon be launched. The global market potential shown by Yingling can be benchmarked against a mainstream mature model from a competitor.' 针对近日影翎无人机新品遇冷的消息，刘靖康在内部信中回应称：「影翎仅中国区 48 小时就卖了 3000 多万元，且多个海外市场目前正在进行认证流程，很快也将上市。影翎展现的全球市场潜力，可以对标友商一款主流成熟机型。」

In the internal letter, Liu Jingkang also stated that regarding the supply chain, about half a year before the drone's launch, several core suppliers of Insta360 Yingling suddenly faced 'exclusive' pressure. The company, relying on its contingency plan, switched supply chains within an extreme timeframe, thus safeguarding the product's lifeline. 在内部信中，刘靖康还表示，在供应链方面，临近飞机上市前半年，影石影翎多家核心供应商突遭「排他」压力，公司凭借预案在极限时间内切换供应链，守住了产品生命线。

Liu Jingkang said: 'This is not the first time we have faced such unfair exclusive tactics. These unconventional, intensive attacks precisely indicate that what we are doing has indeed touched upon certain existing structures.' 刘靖康称：「这已不是我们第一次面对此类不公正的排他手段。这些非常规、密集的攻击，恰恰说明我们所做的事情，的确触动了某些现有格局。」

He believes, 'The more intense the attacks we face, the more it proves the correctness of our direction and the possibility of disrupting existing systems.' 其认为，「我们受到的攻击越猛烈，越能说明我们方向的正确性，和对已有体系实现颠覆的可能。」

Liu Jingkang also mentioned in the letter that panoramic drones are a revolutionary category compared to traditional drones, much like cars are to carriages. He stated that over 70% of the company's revenue comes from original categories, and they will continue to focus on solving problems that no one else has solved through technological innovation, emphasizing that serving customers well is the only long-term focus. 刘靖康还在信中谈到，全景无人机之于传统无人机是如同汽车之于马车的革命性品类。他表示，公司超过 70% 收入来自原创品类，将继续专注于通过技术创新解决无人解决的问题，服务好客户是长期唯一需要关注的事。

Recently, Insta360 officially released the Insta360 A1 panoramic drone, making it the world's first panoramic drone. It supports 8K panoramic video recording, features gesture control, and starts at a price of 6799 yuan. 日前，影石正式发布影翎 A1 全景无人机，并成为全球首款全景无人机，其支持 8K 全景视频录制，能够体感操控，售价为 6799 元起。

item.title: 原字节高级公关总监加入理想汽车
item.guid: 原字节高级公关总监加入理想汽车
item.description:
According to reports from EV Realm, Yang Jibin, former PR director at ByteDance, announced yesterday (December 8) on his WeChat Moments that he is leaving ByteDance to join Li Auto. 据电车界报道，前字节公关总监杨继斌昨日（12 月 8 日）在朋友圈宣布，离开字节跳动，加入理想汽车。

Yang Jibin stated that he officially joined Li Auto this month. Although his position was not disclosed, reports speculate it is likely the head of public relations. 杨继斌表示，本月正式加入了理想汽车。虽未透露职位，但报道猜测应该为公关一号位。

The report points out that Yang Jibin has very little personal information online. He worked at ByteDance for many years and participated in the 'Toutiao vs. Tencent' battle. 报道指出，杨继斌在网上个人资料极少，曾在字节跳动多年，参与过字节和腾讯的头腾大战。

Insiders revealed that he left ByteDance's PR department in September last year, transitioning to a consultant role, and reportedly interviewed with several tech companies, including Xiaomi. This rumor has not been confirmed by him. 内部人士透露，其在去年 9 月已经离开字节公关部，转为顾问，据说陆续参与了包括小米在内的一些科技公司面试。该传言未经本人证实。

item.title: 多个中国厂商入围全球手游发行商收入前 100
item.guid: 多个中国厂商入围全球手游发行商收入前-100
item.description:
Recently, Sensor Tower's Store Intelligence platform showed that in November 2025, a total of 33 Chinese publishers entered the TOP100 global mobile game publisher revenue list, collectively generating $1.95 billion, accounting for 35.8% of the total revenue of the TOP100 global mobile game publishers for this period. 日前，Sensor Tower 商店情报平台显示，2025 年 11 月共 33 个中国厂商入围全球手游发行商收入榜 TOP100，合计吸金 19.5 亿美元，占本期全球 TOP100 手游发行商收入 35.8%。

Specifically: 具体来看：

    Tencent, with the strong explosive power of its leading products, firmly held the top spot in global mobile game publisher revenue. In that month, "Delta Force" saw its global mobile revenue grow by 12% month-on-month, approaching $80 million, with cumulative earnings of $450 million. Leveraging its cross-platform compatibility, "Delta Force" continues to lead the global shooting mobile game sector, becoming one of Tencent's highest-grossing mobile games, second only to Honor of Kings.

    Century Games, with its multi-product synergy, firmly secured the second position in the global mobile game publisher revenue list and maintained its leading position among Chinese mobile game publishers going overseas. Its flagship SLG "Whiteout Survival" served as the core pillar, contributing 54% of the publisher's revenue in November, with cumulative global earnings exceeding $3.8 billion; the new title "Kingshot" performed strongly, forming a "two-wheel drive" with a 36% revenue share in November, and cumulative revenue exceeding $640 million.

Regarding specific games: 具体游戏方面：

    Tencent's "Honor of Kings" and "Delta Force" consecutively topped the Chinese App Store mobile game revenue chart for this period, securing the first and second places.

    On November 20, Tencent's "Teamfight Tactics Mobile" launched the "Strong Sound Showdown" [Gong Xi Fa Cai] limited-time gameplay. The day after the event's release, the game's revenue surged to its highest value since 2025, driving a 38% increase in November revenue and climbing to the 3rd spot on the revenue list.

    On November 5, miHoYo's "Honkai: Star Rail" version 3.7, "Tomorrow, Yesterday's Gone," made a grand arrival. On the same day, it debuted at TOP1 on China's iOS best-selling overall chart, with its revenue in the Chinese iOS market skyrocketing by 460% this month, returning to the 8th spot on the list.

    On November 1, "Arknights" launched its 6.5-year anniversary appreciation celebration. On the day of its launch, its Chinese iOS revenue surged to a nearly 5-year peak, climbing to second place on the mobile game best-seller list, with November revenue skyrocketing by 281%, returning to the 12th spot on the list.

item.title: 智元第 5000 台通用具身机器人量产下线
item.guid: 智元第-5000-台通用具身机器人量产下线
item.description:
On December 8, at AGIBOT's mass production factory, witnessed by live broadcasts from Xinhua News Agency and other media outlets, Peng Zhihui, co-founder, president, and CTO of AGIBOT, announced: 12 月 8 日，智元（AGIBOT）量产工厂内，在新华社等多家媒体的直播见证下，智元联合创始人、总裁兼 CTO 彭志辉宣布：

The 5000th general-purpose embodied robot, Lingxi X2, officially rolled off the production line for mass production.

The cumulative shipment data for AGIBOT's three major product series was simultaneously released on-site: 1742 units of Expedition A1/A2 rolled off the line, 1846 units of Lingxi X1/X2 rolled off the line, and 1412 units of Elf G1/G2 rolled off the line. This milestone signifies that embodied robots have fully transitioned from the technical verification stage to the era of large-scale commercial application. 现场同步公布智元三大产品系列累计出货数据：远征 A1/A2 下线 1742 台，灵犀 X1/X2 下线 1846 台，精灵 G1/G2 下线 1412 台。这一里程碑标志着具身机器人已从技术验证阶段全面迈入规模商用时代。

It is reported that this commemorative 5000th robot was personally delivered by Peng Zhihui to the studio of renowned actor Huang Xiaoming. 据悉，这台具有纪念意义的第 5000 台机器人，由彭志辉亲手交付给知名演员黄晓明的工作室。

Huang Xiaoming revealed that his connection with AGIBOT began with the variety show "Chinese Restaurant," where the companionship of the Expedition A2 robot, Xiao Jiu, made him deeply feel the power of Chinese robotics technology. Subsequent in-depth contact with the AGIBOT team led him to decide to acquire a robot for his studio, keeping pace with the technological wave of embodied AI. 黄晓明透露，自己与智元的结缘始于综艺《中餐厅》，节目中远征 A2 机器人小玖的陪伴让他深刻感受到中国机器人技术的强大，后续与智元团队的深入接触，让他决定为工作室添置一台机器人，紧跟具身智能的科技浪潮。

Peng Zhihui emphasized that the mass production of the 5000th general-purpose embodied robot not only verified Zhiyuan's own large-scale delivery capability, laying the foundation for subsequent production capacity planning of tens of thousands or hundreds of thousands of units, but also proved to the entire industry the feasibility of mass production of general-purpose embodied robots. 彭志辉强调，第 5000 台通用具身机器人量产下线，不仅验证了智元自身的规模化交付能力，为后续万台、十万台级产能规划奠定基础，更向全行业证实了通用具身机器人规模化量产的可行性。

At the same time, stable technical solutions and supply chain systems will drive industry costs into a downward trend, while the massive data accumulated from large-scale applications will also feed back into technological iterations, attracting more developers and partners to join the ecosystem, and promoting the industry into a virtuous development cycle. 同时，稳定的技术方案与供应链体系将带动行业成本进入下降通道，而规模化应用沉淀的海量数据，还将反哺技术迭代，吸引更多开发者与合作伙伴加入生态，推动产业进入良性发展周期。

item.title: 机构：中国智能手机品牌正加速整合 AI 与消费终端
item.guid: 机构：中国智能手机品牌正加速整合-AI-与消费终端
item.description:
Recently, Goldman Sachs pointed out in its latest research report that although Apple has not made substantial progress in Apple Intelligence, major Chinese smartphone brands have already embedded OS-native AI assistants driven by self-developed LLMs and/or third-party LLMs. 日前，高盛在最新发布研报指出，虽然苹果在 Apple Intelligence 方面尚未取得实质性进展，但主要的中国智能手机品牌均已嵌入了由自研 LLM 和/或第三方 LLM 驱动的 OS 原生 AI 助手。

It is reported that this report provides a key interpretation of Chinese AI vendors ByteDance's Doubao, Xiaomi, and Juyuexingchen. 据悉，这份报告对中国 AI 厂商字节旗下豆包、小米和阶跃星辰进行了重点解读。

Goldman Sachs believes that the newly released Doubao mobile assistant has achieved system-level integration through cooperation with smartphone OEC manufacturers, and combined with Doubao's recently released input method product, it reflects ByteDance's intention to expand into mobile internet infrastructure and the smartphone ecosystem. 高盛认为，刚刚发布的豆包手机助手通过与智能手机 OEC 厂商合作实现了系统级整合，结合近期豆包发布的输入法产品，体现了字节向移动互联网基础设施和智能手机生态系统扩张的意图。

At the same time, Goldman Sachs conducted a key analysis of Xiaomi's AI layout, pointing out that Xiaomi has invested heavily in GUI, and its AI agent Super Xiao Ai is among China's top three OS-native AI assistants, alongside OPPO and Huawei assistants, with a penetration rate of 71% in Xiaomi smartphone MAU. 同时，高盛对小米 AI 布局进行了重点分析，指出小米在 GUI 方面投入巨大，旗下 AI 智能体超级小爱与 OPPO、华为助手并列中国前三大 OS 原生 AI 助手，在小米智能手机 MAU 中的渗透率为 71%。

Goldman Sachs also mentioned that large model vendor Juyuexingchen recently open-sourced the GUI agent Gelab, which can be deployed locally and achieved SOTA (state-of-the-art) in multiple benchmark tests. It is understood that this company has also cooperated with ZTE on a mobile assistant for the elderly, and has collaborated with domestic mobile phone manufacturers such as Honor and OPPO on AI phone features. 高盛还提及了大模型厂商阶跃星辰近期开源了 GUI 智能体 Gelab，可在本地部署，且在多项基准测试中达到 SOTA（最先进水平）。据了解这家公司还曾与中兴合作面向老年人的手机助手，并与荣耀、OPPO、等国产手机厂商开展 AI 手机功能合作。

item.title: 💡 Google DeepMind CEO：扩大 AI 规模是实现 AGI 的关键
item.guid: 💡-Google-DeepMind-CEO：扩大-AI-规模是实现-AGI-的关键
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis recently emphasized at the Axios AI+ Summit in San Francisco: 据《商业内幕》报道，Google DeepMind CEO 德米斯・哈萨比斯（Demis Hassabis）近日在旧金山举行的 Axios AI+ 峰会上强调：

The scaling of Artificial Intelligence (AI) must be "pushed to the extreme," which is the key path to achieving Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).

Hassabis pointed out that scaling laws are a core principle of AI progress, meaning "the larger the model, the more data, and the stronger the computing power, the higher the level of intelligence." 哈萨比斯指出，规模定律（scaling laws）是 AI 进步的核心原则，即「模型越大、数据越多、算力越强，智能水平就越高」。

We must push the current scaling of AI to its extreme; it will at least become a critical component of Artificial General Intelligence, and may even constitute the entire AGI system.

AGI is considered a theoretical intelligent system capable of reasoning and planning like humans, and it is a goal that global technology companies are vying to achieve. AGI 被视为能够像人类一样进行推理和规划的理论型智能系统，是全球科技公司竞相追逐的目标。

However, Hassabis also admitted that scaling laws alone might not be sufficient to fully achieve AGI, and "one or two additional breakthroughs" might be needed in the future. 不过，哈萨比斯也承认，仅靠规模定律可能不足以完全实现 AGI，未来或许还需要「一到两个额外的突破」。

He emphasized that scaling has practical limitations: the amount of public data is limited, and increasing computing power means building more data centers, which is not only costly but also puts pressure on the environment. 他强调，规模化存在现实限制：公开数据量有限，增加算力意味着建设更多数据中心，不仅成本高昂，还会对环境造成压力。

Meanwhile, different voices have emerged in the industry. 与此同时，业界也出现了不同声音。

Former Meta Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun believes that scaling laws are not a panacea. In his speech at the National University of Singapore in April this year, he pointed out: "Most truly interesting problems perform extremely poorly under scaling laws; you cannot simply assume that piling up data and computing power will produce smarter AI." 前 Meta 首席 AI 科学家 Yann LeCun（杨立昆）认为，规模定律并非万能。他在今年 4 月新加坡国立大学的演讲中指出：「大多数真正有趣的问题在规模定律下表现得极其糟糕，你不能简单地认为堆数据和堆算力就能产出更聪明的 AI。」

Previously, LeCun had left Meta to found a new company, dedicated to developing "world models" based on spatial data, aiming to create a new generation of AI systems capable of understanding the physical world, possessing persistent memory, and complex reasoning abilities. 此前，LeCun 已离开 Meta 创办新公司，致力于研发基于空间数据的「世界模型」，旨在打造能够理解物理世界、具备持久记忆和复杂推理能力的新一代 AI 系统。

item.title: Google 公布 XR 设备路线
item.guid: Google-公布-XR-设备路线
item.description:
Early this morning, the Android Show event officially took place, where Google formally disclosed what they see as four XR device routes: 今天凌晨，Android Show 活动正式举行，Google 在活动上正式披露了他们眼中四种 XR 设备路线：

XR headsets, wired XR glasses, wireless XR glasses, wireless XR glasses

Among them, the core of the hardware—the Android XR system—was officially announced for the first time at the end of last year. Google emphasized that developing for Android is developing for Android XR, and the latter can directly be compatible with most phone and tablet applications on the Google PlayStore. 其中，硬件的核心——Android XR 系统于去年年底首次正式公布。而 Google 强调，为 Android 开发，就是在为 Android XR 开发，后者可以直接兼容使用 Google PlayStore 上的大部分手机和平板应用。

It is reported that Android XR has a stronger appeal than Meta Horizon platform and is more open than Apple, which means that more third-party manufacturers will develop Android XR devices in the future, making the "pie" bigger and bigger, and XR application and content producers will be more willing to join the ecosystem. 据悉，Android XR 的号召力比 Meta Horizon 平台更强，也比苹果更开放，这意味着未来将有更多第三方厂商开发 Android XR 设备，蛋糕越做越大，XR 应用和内容的生产者更愿意加入生态。

Hardware aspects: 硬件方面：

    Lightweight XR Device Project Aura:

This product debuted in May this year, created in collaboration with domestic AR glasses manufacturer XREAL. 该产品于今年 5 月首次亮相，与国内 AR 眼镜厂商 XREAL 合作打造。

It is a "wired XR glasses" that achieves a binocular XR effect similar to a head-mounted display in the lightweight and convenient form of glasses. Aura supports gesture interaction like a head-mounted display and has a passthrough effect, allowing users to see their surroundings with the application interface projected onto it. 其为一款「有线 XR 眼镜」，以眼镜这种轻巧方便的形式，实现类似头显的双目 XR 效果。Aura 支持和头显一样的手势交互，并带有透视效果，用户能够看到周围环境，应用界面投射其上。

Aura achieves a 70° FOV, the largest practical field of view for consumer AR, allowing the Gemini assistant to interact better with the real world and providing an immersive viewing experience; in terms of performance, it uses the same Qualcomm Snapdragon XR2 Plus Gen 2 chipset as the Samsung Galaxy XR. Aura 实现了 70° FOV，为消费级 AR 的最大实用视场，能够让 Gemini 助手更好地与真实世界进行互动，也能获得沉浸式的观影体验；性能方面则采用了三星 Galaxy XR 同款高通骁龙 XR2 Plus Gen 2 芯片组。

    Smart Glasses:

Google announced that these products will collaborate with traditional eyewear fashion brands Warby Parker and Gentle Monster. Google 宣布了这类产品将与 Warby Parker 以及 Gentle Monster 连个传统眼镜潮牌合作。

The first type of glasses is the most basic form, similar to Ray-Ban Meta, which we call "AI glasses." They don't have any display screen; users can communicate with Gemini, take photos, and listen to music using the glasses. Although this product is not truly "XR" glasses, it is the most widely accepted category by the public. 第一款眼镜，是类似 Ray-Ban Meta 的最基础形态，我们称之为「AI 眼镜」不带任何显示屏，用户可以用眼镜和 Gemini 沟通、拍照、听歌。这种产品虽然不是真的「XR」眼镜，却是大众接受度最高的品类。

Google places more importance on the second type, which is essentially adding a monocular AR display to the first type to show simple cards and components, similar to Meta Ray-Ban Display. This is also the category that was demonstrated at this year's I/O conference. Google 更看重的是第二款，其实就是在第一款的基础上增加单目 AR 显示屏，用来显示一些简单的卡片和组件，类似 Meta Ray-Ban Display，这也是今年 I/O 大会上进行过演示的品类。

It is worth mentioning that Google revealed to The Verge that, to allow more people to use the multimodal capabilities of the glasses, Android XR glasses will also support iOS next year. 值得一提的是，Google 向 The Verge 透露，为了更多人使用眼镜的多模态能力，明年 Android XR 眼镜还会支持 iOS。

item.title: 微信公众号大更新：文章支持 3 次修改
item.guid: 微信公众号大更新：文章支持-3-次修改
item.description:
According to observations by iFanr, WeChat Official Accounts recently quietly updated their article modification rules: 据爱范儿观察发现，微信公众号日前悄悄更新了文章修改规则：

Each piece of content can be modified 3 times, supporting modifications to the title, body text, images, videos, cover, and abstract. 每篇内容可修改 3 次，支持对标题、正文文字、图片、视频、封面及摘要进行修改。

Specific rules: 具体规则方面：

    You can modify the title (3 characters), body text (120 characters), images (3), videos (1), cover, and abstract. The total number of characters in the modified abstract is still required not to exceed 120 characters.

    After modification, the modification time will be displayed at the bottom of the article; if the title is modified, "Title has been modified" will also be displayed at the top of the article.

    The new title and cover will take effect on the account homepage and in new share cards. The new abstract will take effect in new share cards.

item.title: vivo S50 系列将于 12 月 15 日发布
item.guid: vivo-S50-系列将于-12-月-15-日发布
item.description:
Yesterday, vivo officially announced that it will release its new vivo S50 series on December 15th. 昨日，vivo 正式宣布，将于 12 月 15 日发布旗下 vivo S50 系列新机。

The new phone will have two versions: Standard Edition and Pro mini Edition. In terms of appearance design, the Standard Edition will feature a rectangular camera Deco design, while the Pro mini will adopt a "floating island" lens module design. Both vivo S50 series models will offer an aerospace-grade aluminum alloy middle frame and come in colors such as "Confession" and "Quiet Blue." 新机共有两个版本：标准版与 Pro mini 版本。外观设计上，标准版将采用矩形相机 Deco 设计，而 Pro mini 将采用「浮空岛」镜组设计。vivo S50 系列均提供航空铝金属中框，并且提供「告白」「悠悠蓝」等配色。

The vivo S50 series will offer a triple rear camera setup, with all models featuring the Sony IMX882 large-sensor periscope telephoto lens; in terms of performance, the Pro mini will be equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen5 processor, paired with LPDDR5X Ultra + UFS4.1. vivo S50 系列将提供后置三摄方案，全系搭载索尼 IMX882 大底潜望长焦；性能方面，Pro mini 将搭载高通骁龙 8 Gen5 处理器，配备 LPDDR5X Ultra + UFS4.1。

In addition, the new machine will also be equipped with 3D ultrasonic fingerprint 2.0, IP69 + IP68 full-level waterproofing, and the Pro mini supports 40W wireless flash charging. 另外，新机还将配备 3D 超声波指纹 2.0、IP69 + IP68 级满级防水，Pro mini 支持 40W 无线闪充。

item.title: 五菱今日揭晓首款硬派 SUV
item.guid: 五菱今日揭晓首款硬派-SUV
item.description:
Yesterday, Wuling Motors announced that it would unveil the first hardcore SUV model of the Starlight family today, claiming "new member, hardcore arrival." 昨日，五菱汽车宣布，将在今日公布星光家族首款硬派 SUV 车型，并号称「新成员硬核来袭」。

It is learned from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology's "Announcement of Road Motor Vehicle Manufacturers and Products" (Batch 397) new vehicle product public announcement list in July this year that the new car list includes a brand-new SUV model with an appearance similar to the model in the poster. 从今年 7 月工信部《道路机动车辆生产企业及产品公告》（第 397 批）的车辆新产品公示清单中获悉，新车名单中有一款与海报中车型外观相似的全新 SUV 车型。

According to information from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, the new car will offer three power versions: pure electric, plug-in hybrid, and fuel. Its dimensions are 4745 x 1850 x 1755/1770mm, with a wheelbase of 2810mm, and it will be available in 5- or 7-seat configurations. 工信部信息显示，新车将提供纯电、插混、燃油三个动力版本，尺寸为 4745 x 1850 x 1755/1770mm，轴距 2810mm，提供 5/7 座。

In terms of power, the pure electric version of the new car uses a Liuzhou Saike 100kW motor; the plug-in hybrid and fuel versions respectively use Liuzhou Saike's 1.5L model LBG engine (78kW) and 1.5T model LC4 engine (130kW). 动力方面，纯电版新车采用柳州赛克 100kW 功率电机；插混及燃油版分别采用柳州赛克的 1.5L 型号 LBG 发动机（78kW）和 1.5T 型号 LC4 发动机（130kW）。

item.title: 奔驰发布新一代 GLB
item.guid: 奔驰发布新一代-GLB
item.description:
Yesterday, Mercedes-Benz officially released the new generation GLB SUV model. First, let's look at the price: 昨日，梅赛德斯-奔驰正式发布了新一代的 GLB SUV 车型，先看价格：

The starting price is 59,000 euros (approximately 485,900 RMB). Currently, a pure electric version is offered, and a 1.5L mild-hybrid four-cylinder gasoline version will be available in the future. 起售价为 5.9 万欧元（约合人民币 48.59 万元），目前提供纯电版本，未来还将提供 1.5L 轻混四缸汽油版。

The new car's front fascia features a brand-new full-width light cluster design, maintaining the same style as the new CLA. The rear also adopts a full-width light cluster design, with three-pointed star elements at both the front and rear. 新车前脸采用全新的贯穿式灯组设计，与新款 CLA 保持相同风格。尾部同样采用贯穿式灯组设计，并且前后均有三叉星徽元素。

The new generation GLB's wheelbase has increased by 60mm to 2889mm, and its body length has grown to 4732mm. As a result, the new car's third row offers more spaciousness—officially stated to accommodate passengers up to 1.71m tall. 新一代 GLB 轴距增加了 60mm，达到 2889mm，车身长度则增长至 4732mm。因此，新车第三排有了更宽敞的空间表现——官方表示能够容纳 1.71m 身高的乘客。

For the interior, the new car adopts the new generation MBUX infotainment system, with an optional triple screen setup (both the central control screen and the passenger entertainment screen are 14 inches). Additionally, the new car offers a mechanical front trunk and front-row massage. 内饰方面，新车采用新一代 MBUX 车载系统，可选装三联屏（中控屏及副驾娱乐屏均为 14 英寸）。同时，新车提供机械式前备箱、前排按摩。

In terms of performance, the new generation GLB adopts an 800V architecture, offering two versions: rear-wheel drive and all-wheel drive, with 260 horsepower and 349 horsepower respectively. The new car is equipped with an 85kWh battery, supports up to 360kW DC fast charging, and has a maximum range of 631km. 性能方面，新一代 GLB 采用 800V 架构，提供后驱及四驱两个版本，分别为 260 匹马力和 349 匹马力；新车配备 85kWh 电池，支持最高 360kW 直流充电，续航最高可达 631km。

The fuel version will be launched later next year, equipped with a 1.5L mild-hybrid four-cylinder gasoline engine, with three output settings: 134 hp front-wheel drive, 161 hp front-wheel drive, and 188 hp all-wheel drive. The mild-hybrid system includes a 1.3kWh battery and a 27 hp electric motor, integrated into the automatic transmission, allowing for pure electric drive at low speeds and short distances. 燃油版车型将在明年稍晚推出，搭载 1.5L 轻混四缸汽油机，共三种输出设定：134 匹前驱、161 匹前驱与 188 匹四驱。轻混系统包括 1.3kWh 电池与 27 匹电动机，集成在自动变速箱中，可在低速短距离纯电驱动。

item.title: 智谱开源 GLM-4.6V：从看懂图片到自动完成任务
item.guid: 智谱开源-GLM-4.6V：从看懂图片到自动完成任务
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhipu AI officially announced the open-sourcing of the GLM-4.6V series of multimodal large models, including GLM-4.6V (106B-A12B) for high-performance cloud scenarios and GLM-4.6V-Flash (9B) for local deployment and low latency. 昨天，智谱官方宣布正式开源 GLM-4.6V 系列多模态大模型，包括面向云端高性能场景的 GLM-4.6V（106B-A12B）与面向本地部署与低延迟的 GLM-4.6V-Flash（9B）。

According to the introduction, this version has achieved significant breakthroughs in multimodal capabilities, moving from "understanding images" to "automatically completing tasks," demonstrating stronger comprehension and execution. Key upgrades include: 据介绍，这一版本在多模态能力上实现了显著突破，能够从「看懂图片」到「自动完成任务」，展现出更强的理解与执行力。核心升级包括：

    Enhanced visual understanding: The model can process complex image content, supporting more refined scene recognition and semantic analysis;

    Task automation: In scenarios combining text and images, the model can directly generate solutions, improving interaction efficiency;

    Open-source and open access: Zhipu AI announced that this version is fully open, allowing developers to freely call and test it, promoting the application and implementation of multimodal AI.

The official statement emphasizes that by opening up model capabilities, Zhipu AI hopes to accelerate the application and expansion of AI in education, scientific research, industry, and other fields. Currently, the weights, inference code, and example projects for the GLM-4.6V series models have been open-sourced. 官方强调，通过开放模型能力，智谱希望加速 AI 在教育、科研、工业等领域的应用扩展。目前，GLM-4.6V 系列模型的权重、推理代码与示例工程已开源。

item.title: 盒马承认生产草莓蛋糕出问题
item.guid: 盒马承认生产草莓蛋糕出问题
item.description:
Recently, many consumers have posted complaints that Hema's strawberry box cakes have appeared "super salty". 近期，有不少消费者发文吐槽，盒马的草莓盒子蛋糕出现「超级咸」的情况。

According to reports from Boss Live, some consumers described that the cream part of the cake was normal, but the cake base was "bitterly salty", suspecting that sugar was mistakenly replaced with salt during the production process. Netizens joked, "How can someone make such a big blunder?" 据老板联播报道，有消费者描述，蛋糕的奶油部分正常，但蛋糕胚却「咸得发苦」，怀疑在生产过程中误将糖替换为盐，网友调侃「人怎么能闯这么大的篓子」。

It is reported that the problematic cakes were priced at 79.9 yuan, mostly from the same batch, produced on December 5th, and put on sale on December 6th. 据悉，出现问题的蛋糕售价为 79.9 元，多属于同一批次，生产日期为 12 月 5 日，并于 12 月 6 日上架销售。

Regarding the above situation, Hema customer service responded that, upon verification, the product's taste was affected by individual raw material operational deviations. Approximately 60 units of the affected product were sold in 7 stores. We deeply apologize for this and have completed investigation and adjustment at the first instance. Currently, we are conducting customer callbacks and compensation for the products already sold in the affected areas. 对于上述情况，盒马客服回应称，据核实，该商品系个别原料操作偏差影响口感，涉及商品在 7 家门店售出约 60 份。我们对此深表歉意，已在第一时间完成排查与调整，目前针对当地已售商品进行顾客回访和补偿。

item.title: 经典版 QQ 回归
item.guid: 经典版-QQ-回归
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent QQ announced that the PC version of QQ supports dual-mode switching. 昨天，腾讯 QQ 宣布，PC 端 QQ 支持双模式切换。

According to the introduction, the updated QQ will once again support separate message lists and chat windows, enabling the classic QQ friend list display and automatic hiding of the message bar when docked to the edge. 据介绍，更新后的 QQ 将重新支持消息列表和聊天窗口分开，实现经典的 QQ 好友列表显示，并且能够消息栏贴边自动隐藏。

At the same time, the new QQ color palette will also be free to use, supporting various theme color combinations, custom themes/bubble colors, and more. It also supports batch importing of emoji packs, importing chat history from previous versions, etc. 同时，新版 QQ 调色盘也将免费使用，支持多种主题色搭配、自定义主题/气泡等颜色。另外还支持批量导入表情包、导入历史版本聊天记录等。

item.title: 《鹅鸭杀》手游定档 1 月 7 日上线
item.guid: 《鹅鸭杀》手游定档-1-月-7-日上线
item.description:
Recently, the mobile game "Goose Goose Duck" officially announced that it will be officially launched on January 7, 2026. 日前，《鹅鸭杀》手游正式宣布，将于 2026 年 1 月 7 日正式上线。

According to previous news, this domestic version of the "Goose Goose Duck" mobile game is a deep collaboration with Kingsoft Shiyou and will be jointly launched. 据此前消息，本次《鹅鸭杀》国行手游与金山世游进行深度合作，并共同推出。

It is reported that "Goose Goose Duck" is a casual strategy social deduction game. Through faction confrontation, task mechanisms, diverse roles, and strong interactivity, it has become a phenomenal popular online game in recent years. In January 2023, the peak concurrent online players for "Goose Goose Duck" on Steam exceeded 700,000, with over 70% of global players coming from China. 据悉，《鹅鸭杀》是一款休闲策略型社交推理游戏，通过阵营对抗、任务机制、角色多样性及强互动性，成为近年现象级的热门联机游戏。2023 年 1 月，《鹅鸭杀》的 Steam 同时在线人数峰值突破 70 万，且全球超 70% 玩家来自中国。

item.title: 洛杉矶影评人协会奖获奖名单公布
item.guid: 洛杉矶影评人协会奖获奖名单公布
item.description:
Yesterday, the winners of the 2025 Los Angeles Film Critics Association Awards were officially announced: 昨日，2025 洛杉矶影评人协会奖获奖名单正式公布：

    “War and War” won Best Picture; “The Spy” came in second, and also won Best Non-English Language Film;

    Paul Thomas Anderson, director of "War and War", won Best Director; Ryan Coogler, director of "The Sinner", came in second;

    Rose Byrne and Ethan Hawke won Best Lead Actor for "If I Had Legs, I'd Kick You" and "Blue Moon" respectively; Timothée Chalamet and Wagner Moura came in second for "Supreme Marty" and "The Spy";

    Best Supporting Actor was awarded to Stellan Skarsgård and Tiana Taylor (for "Emotional Value" and "War and War" respectively);

    The Lifetime Achievement Award was given to Philip Kaufman; Eva Victor won the New Generation Award for "Sorry, Baby".

item.title: 朋克蜘蛛侠单人电影即将完成剧本
item.guid: 朋克蜘蛛侠单人电影即将完成剧本
item.description:
According to Deadline, cited by Watchmen Hollywood, Daniel Kaluuya revealed that he is developing a solo Spider-Punk film and is about to complete the first draft of the script; Kaluuya will also co-write with Ajon Singh. 据守望好莱坞援引 Deadline 报道，丹尼尔·卡卢亚透露，其正在开发的朋克蜘蛛侠单人电影，并即将完成第一版剧本；同时卡卢亚与与 Ajon Singh 将一起担任编剧。

It is reported that this version of Spider-Punk/Hobie Brown is from "Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse", voiced by Kaluuya. He appeared with a "cool" collage art style and will also return in "Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse". 据悉，这版 Spider-Punk/Hobie Brown 来自《蜘蛛侠：纵横宇宙》，由卡卢亚担任配音。以「酷酷的」拼贴画风登场，也会回归《蜘蛛侠：超越宇宙》。

Kaluuya could not reveal more information about the solo animated film for Spider-Punk, only stating that it is "in progress," and he also said: 对于朋克蜘蛛侠的单人动画电影的更多信息，卡卢亚还无法透露，只表示「正在进行中」，他也称：

These "Spider-Verse" movies resonate with me and inspire me. I think these filmmakers and animators are the best storytellers in this field, and I want to immerse myself in such an environment to learn from their knowledge.

item.title: 《超女：明日之女》曝光先导预告
item.guid: 《超女：明日之女》曝光先导预告
item.description:
Recently, DC's new superhero film "Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow" released its teaser trailer, and the film will be released in North America on June 26 next year. 日前，DC 超级英雄新片《超女：明日之女》曝光先导预告，影片将于明年 6 月 26 日北美上映。

It is reported that the film is adapted from Tom King's DC comic, telling the story of Kryptonian survivor Supergirl Kara Zor-El assisting alien girl Lucy Marie Noll in interstellar revenge, shaping the image of a hardcore female hero who grew up in a harsh environment. 据悉，影片改编自汤姆·金的 DC 漫画，讲述氪星幸存者超级少女卡拉·佐-艾尔协助外星少女露西·玛丽·诺尔展开星际复仇的故事，塑造了在残酷环境中成长的硬核女英雄形象。

The film is directed by Craig Gillespie, co-written by Otto Binder, Tom King, Ana Nogueira, and Al Plastino, and stars Milly Alcock, Jason Momoa, Matthias Schoenaerts, and Eve Ridley. 该片由克雷格·吉勒斯佩执导，奥托·班德、汤姆·金、安娜·诺盖拉、阿尔·派拉斯提诺联合编剧，米莉·阿尔柯克、杰森·莫玛、马提亚斯·修奈尔、伊芙·雷德利主演。
